title: Thanks giving Lunch
sugge: Invitations, preparations for food, healthy choices, and setting up the table.

The lady in red is thinking about where to place what dish. The girl in yellow is an active participant thinking about what to eat haha. The boy in brown is asking a question about food. The man in a suit is helping set the table.
Everyone will sit at the table to enjoy their meal during thanksgiving

title: Beach Clean-Up
sugge: Friends are enjoying the beach, but also making sure it’s clean!
A vacation, or an initiative to go to a beach and make sure it’s clean!
All seem to be happy doing the clean-up because it helps protect the planet while keeping it tidy
Everyone will happily spend time on a clean beach with warm waters

title: Soccer Practice
sugge: They must have attended some classes before going to the field to play
All seem to be excited for their peer to score a goal
Their peer will score the goal and all will be happy!
